txt.en: Overcome with emotion, Limril has become upset and Gladion is concerned for her.
Instance: A Quiet Meal

'I am so embarrassed, [placeholder]. I asked you to set the table for six... because when last you were here, we were expecting Fuirion...'

She falls silent. After a moment she sighs unhappily and wrings her hands.

'But he will never join us for a meal again, will he? It will take some time to become used to that idea, if such a thing is even possible. I do not know if it is, but... we will try.

'I will talk to Gladion. For now, let us try to enjoy our meal.'
Greet Gladion as he comes home.
Talk to Gladion

'I am glad you would share a meal with us once again, [placeholder]. I know you will insist on helping, so I will not try to dissuade you.\n\n'You recall where we keep the dishes? The hutch in the corner -- would you set the table for six, if you please?'
Talk to Limril
You should set the table for Limril
'Let us try and enjoy a quiet meal. I cannot pretend it will be easy... but we must do what we can to keep living, to keep surviving, no matter the family and the friends we have lost.'
Wait for the meal to begin
Talk to Limril
Limril has asked you to help with dinner.
The peace is broken by the sound of the door opening
'Thank you for the help, [placeholder]. Gladion should be home any moment now.'
Gather dishes from the hutch
Limril is in her home in Dínadab in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should offer to help Limril with dinner while she waits for Gladion.
Limril is in her home in Dínadab in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should see what else Limril needs.
Set the table for six ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The hutch is in the corner.\n\nGather dishes from the hutch, and set the table.
The table is in Gladion and Limril's home.\n\nGather dishes from the hutch, and set the table.
Talk to Limril
Offer to help Limril with dinner
You have helped prepare for dinner, and should now wait for the meal to begin.
Overcome with emotion, Limril has become upset and Gladion is concerned for her.
'Good evening everyone.\n\n'[placeholder], I'm glad you can join us tonight.'
Fuirion's blood begins to form a pool on the floor, and it is clear that he has sustained a deep slash-wound in his belly
'Will you please speak with Limril for me, and learn what has so upset her?'
Help Limril by setting the table
